title: Mental Health and Psychosocial Burden Among Patients with Skin of Color Living with Vitiligo: Findings from the Global VALIANT Study
details: P Grimes, IH Hamzavi, K Bibeau, JE Harris, N van Geel… - Dermatology and Therapy, 2025
abstract: Introduction Factors associated with vitiligo burden in patients with darker skin (Fitzpatrick skin types IV–VI) are not fully understood. This analysis of patients in the global VALIANT study examined the quality of life (QoL) and psychosocial health …
